ComicInfo.Summary:
The Thirsty Idol: An ancient idol tells of great treasures when bathed in human blood. This leads to mayhem, murder and a foolish search fueled by greed.
Eyes of Evil: Secluded in a Parisian art gallery hangs an evil portrait. When an art thief tries to steal it at night, he is instantly killed.
The Cup of the Dead: Dr. Conover brings home a death-bringing relic from the Andes. As the "Cup of the Dead" threatens to take more innocent lives, Conover makes a sacrifice to Inca medicine man Dervaro.
Death Warmed Over: An escaped convict hides in a furnace room. He is found only when the janitor accidentally blows up the boiler.
The Vengeance of Mark Denton: Mark Denton is ruthlessly killed by his unfaithful wife and a rival. The ferryman across the Styx grants him return to life to wreak his vengeance.
Haunted Houses: Accounts of spook houses in the United States.
ComicInfo.Title: The Thirsty Idol; Eyes of Evil; The Cup of the Dead; Death Warmed Over; The Vengeance of Mark Denton; Haunted Houses
